annotation: a special bone of flying fox
The translation for "needle" in bwatoo is not clear regarding to the two dictionnaires :- Dictionnaire french-bwatto "aiguille" - doobwa- Dictionnaire bwatoo-french doobwa - "feuille"

language: East Sumbanese, Umbu Ratu Nggai dialect
Kadazan Dusun of Taginambur, Kota Belud, Sabah, Malaysia

annotation: Wing bone of flying-fox, (sewing) needle B. (Bst.1987)
Needle for sewing thatch; tattooing comb, (Sma)
